text:
Infoxchange | Melbourne | Systems Operations Engineer + Systems Operations Lead | Onsite | Full-time

We're a non-profit that develops and hosts a decent number of web applications that are used heavily throughout Australia by other NFPs, NGOs, Government Departments and communities.

Modern Ops Team that works closely with developers, we automate all-the-things and CI/CD everything we possibly can, very rewarding work with a team that's been long engaged in the DevOps scene. If you're in Melbourne - you've probably seen us talking at local meetups more than a few times.

https://www.jobseeker.org.au/job/48960-systems-operations-en...
